content:
{
  "name": "jsonx",
  "version": "1.1.0",
  "description": "React JSON Syntax - Construct React elements, JSX and HTML with JSON without transpilers. JSONX supports React Function and Class Components, React Lazy and Suspense Components, and full support for React Hooks",
  "main": "dist/jsonx.cjs.js",
  "module": "src/main.js",
  "esm": "dist/jsonx.esm.js",
  "browser": "dist/jsonx.umd.js",
  "web": "dist/jsonx.web.js",
  "modules.root": "lib",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "rollup -c -w",
    "test_simple": "node test/test.js",
    "benchmark": "node -r esm  benchmark/main_bmrk.js",
    "test": "jest --coverage",
    "doc": "esdoc",
    "compile": "tsc",
    "build": "tsc && rollup -c && esdoc",
    "coverage": "nyc report --temp-directory=coverage --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/repetere/jsonx.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "jsx",
    "React",
    "server-side-react",
    "json jsx",
    "jamstack",
    "json",
    "jsonx",
    "reactive",
    "react-json",
    "react-json-schema",
    "json-react",
    "jsx-json"
  ],
  "author": {
    "name": "Yaw Joseph Etse",
    "email": "yaw@repetere.io"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/repetere/jsonx/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/repetere/jsonx#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.8.4",
    "@babel/plugin-external-helpers": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-export-default-from": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-export-namespace-from": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/plugin-syntax-dynamic-import": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.8.4",
    "@babel/preset-react": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/preset-typescript": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.8.4",
    "@react-spectre/components": "^1.0.0-16",
    "@react-spectre/elements": "^1.0.0-16",
    "@react-spectre/layout": "^1.0.0-16",
    "@repetere/esdoc-inject-gtm-plugin": "^0.1.0",
    "@types/chai": "^4.2.9",
    "@types/jest": "^25.1.3",
    "@types/jsdom-global": "^3.0.2",
    "@types/luxon": "^1.21.0",
    "@types/memory-cache": "^0.2.0",
    "@types/numeral": "0.0.26",
    "@types/react": "^16.9.22",
    "@types/react-dom": "^16.9.5",
    "@types/react-dom-factories": "^1.0.2",
    "@types/sinon": "^7.5.1",
    "@types/ua-parser-js": "^0.7.33",
    "@types/use-global-hook": "^0.1.2",
    "babel-jest": "^25.1.0",
    "babel-plugin-replace-imports": "^1.0.2",
    "benchmark": "^2.1.4",
    "bootstrap": "^4.4.1",
    "bulma": "^0.8.0",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "chai-as-promised": "^7.1.1",
    "coveralls": "^3.0.9",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-inject-script-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-publish-markdown-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^6.10.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^3.1.2",
    "esm": "^3.2.25",
    "install": "^0.13.0",
    "jest": "^25.1.0",
    "jsdom": "^16.2.0",
    "jsdom-global": "^3.0.2",
    "lodash-es": "^4.17.15",
    "materialize-css": "^1.0.0",
    "microtime": "^3.0.0",
    "mini.css": "^3.0.1",
    "mocha": "^7.0.1",
    "mocha-sinon": "^2.1.0",
    "nyc": "^15.0.0",
    "prettier": "^1.19.1",
    "react-bootstrap": "^1.0.0-beta.16",
    "react-materialize": "^3.5.9",
    "react-md": "^1.15.1",
    "react-spectre": "0.0.1-alpha.0",
    "rollup": "^1.31.1",
    "rollup-plugin-alias": "^2.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-async": "^1.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^4.3.3",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^10.1.0",
    "rollup-plugin-node-builtins": "^2.1.2",
    "rollup-plugin-node-globals": "^1.2.1",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^5.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-replace": "^2.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-terser": "^5.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-terser-js": "^1.0.2",
    "rollup-plugin-typescript": "^1.0.1",
    "routes": "^2.1.0",
    "semantic-ui-react": "^0.88.2",
    "sinon": "^9.0.0",
    "sinon-chai": "^3.5.0",
    "spectre.css": "^0.5.8",
    "ts-jest": "^25.2.1",
    "ts-node": "^8.6.2",
    "tsd-jsdoc": "^2.4.0",
    "tslib": "^1.11.0",
    "tslint-config-prettier": "^1.18.0",
    "typescript": "^3.8.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "create-react-class": "^15.6.3",
    "luxon": "^1.22.0",
    "memory-cache": "^0.2.0",
    "numeral": "^2.0.6",
    "react": "^16.12.0",
    "react-dom": "^16.12.0",
    "react-dom-factories": "^1.0.2",
    "ua-parser-js": "^0.7.21",
    "use-global-hook": "^0.1.12"
  }
}

content:
# Frequently Asked Questions

## Scaling

- **How do I scale and descale my inputs?**
  - The library is only for model create, data engineering and modeling is typically handled elsewhere
  - Check out the regression examples (hint: use [ModelScript](https://repetere.github.io/modelscript/)).
- **How do I cross validate, test/train split, K-fold, etc?**
  - (See above) The library is only for model create, data engineering and modeling is typically handled elsewhere
  - Check out the code examples (hint: use [ModelScript](https://repetere.github.io/modelscript/)).

name: ./manual/faq.md
content:
# Frequently Asked Questions

## Scaling

- **How do I scale and descale my inputs?**
  - The library is only for model create, data engineering and modeling is typically handled elsewhere
  - Check out the regression examples (hint: use [ModelScript](https://repetere.github.io/modelscript/)).
- **How do I cross validate, test/train split, K-fold, etc?**
  - (See above) The library is only for model create, data engineering and modeling is typically handled elsewhere
  - Check out the code examples (hint: use [ModelScript](https://repetere.github.io/modelscript/)).

name: ./CHANGELOG.md
content:
# Changelog

## 3.0.0 (2019-04-20)

- **Chore**
  - Update Documentation

## 2.6.0 (2019-04-19)

- **Feat**
  - Added new compilation options jsonx.compile, jsonx.outputJSON, jsonx.outputHTML, jsonx.outputJSX
- **Fix**
  - pass functions in jsonx object values
- **Chore**
  - added new benchmark tests

## 2.2.0 (2019-04-01)

- **Feat**
  - Added React.lazy support
  - Added React.Suspense support
- **Fix**
  - Named class support via options
  - passing state and props to class render component via options
- **Chore**
  
## 2.1.0 (2019-04-01)

- **Feat**
- **Fix**
  - Improved inline function support
  - Improved debugging support
  - Automated parameter detection
- **Chore**
  - Update Documentation

## 2.0.0 (2019-03-29)

- **Feat**
  - Added support for Function Components
  - Added support for Hooks
- **Fix**
  - Supports refs on __functionProps
- **Chore**
  - Update Documentation
